resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text:
<h1 class="h2" style="box-sizing: border-box; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0.5rem; line-height: 1.2; font-size: 2rem; color: #212529; font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, 'Helvetica Neue', Arial, 'Noto Sans', sans-serif, 'Apple Color Emoji', 'Segoe UI Emoji', 'Segoe UI Symbol', 'Noto Color Emoji';">WPA pamphlets and leaflets for 1938 to 1940
<a title="WPA pamphlets and leaflets for 1938 to 1940" href="https://a860-collectionguides.nyc.gov/repositories/2/accessions/6274" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Contains pamphlets and leaflets published by the Board of Education in cooperation with the Federal Works Agency, Works Projects Administration for the City of New York. The majority of these pamphlets are addressed to children and consist of stories and quizzes on the same. One or two appear to be addressed to adult groups. There are about 30 to 35 pieces, some of which are duplicated.
resource.chars:
WPA pamphlets and leaflets for 1938 to 1940

Contains pamphlets and leaflets published by the Board of Education in cooperation with the Federal Works Agency, Works Projects Administration for the City of New York. The majority of these pamphlets are addressed to children and consist of stories and quizzes on the same. One or two appear to be addressed to adult groups. There are about 30 to 35 pieces, some of which are duplicated.
